trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
Defines the delegate for the <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule" /> class.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventHandler> delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.

You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>事件<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中類別，如本主題的範例所示。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventHandler> to replace the creation of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> with your own custom object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventHandler>來取代建立<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>物件<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>與您自己的自訂物件。

trans-unit.source: To do this, define a delegate using the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventHandler> and assign it to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請定義使用委派<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventHandler>並將它指派給<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>事件<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中所包含的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event adds a trace notification for an application where trace is enabled in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>事件加入追蹤通知應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中啟用追蹤的位置。
